item.title: Nichole (Dirty H) add a quote by Jesse Ball
item.description: "Three things are required of you: the wishes you made when you first knew the breadth of this life; the contract you signed when you decided your wishes were not true or possible; and the exacting of the punishment you agreed to when you knew you would break the contract of your life." -- Jesse Ball

item.title: Nichole (Dirty H) add a quote by Truman Capote
item.description: "Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor." -- Truman Capote

item.title: Nichole (Dirty H) add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Nichole (Dirty H) add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nichole (Dirty H) add a quote by Jordan Castillo Price
item.description:
"You've been really hard on my clothes lately", I said. I pushed him away just enough to slip out of my T-shirt and drop it on the floor before he turned it into a stretched-out rag.
"I've been really hard...and your clothes are in my way." -- Jordan Castillo Price
